item.title: 今日评论：英国选民继续变得越来越不稳定，部落意识越来越淡薄，这意味着保守党的 "加拿大 1993 "式末日和保守党第五次连任并非不可能：
item.description:
Today's note: British voters continue to get more volatile and less tribal which means that both the 'Canada 1993' style apocalypse for the Conservatives and a fifth Tory term aren't impossible: https://t.co/xwAwYCngIO

— Stephen Bush (@stephenkb) March 7, 2024

item.title: 杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）在大选前的重要预算案中传递的首要信息是，艰难的经济选择正在取得成效。但没有提及的是，残酷的财政清算迫在眉睫
item.description:
Jeremy Hunt’s overriding message in his big pre-election Budget was that hard economic choices are paying off. Left unsaid was the brutal fiscal reckoning looming https://t.co/ojdxAHW7Vj pic.twitter.com/iy3P0YlNe7

— Financial Times (@FT) March 7, 2024

item.title: 在日益专制的氛围中，克里姆林宫降低了将谁视为投毒目标的门槛。@courtney_ft 观察俄罗斯疑似 "软投毒 "事件的蔓延情况
item.description:
In an increasingly authoritarian atmosphere, the Kremlin has lowered the bar for who is deemed a target for poisoning. @courtney_ft looks at the spread of suspected ‘soft poisonings’ in Russiahttps://t.co/51riq36TpO pic.twitter.com/sGzHmlQsOO

— Financial Times (@FT) March 7, 2024

item.title: 瑞典将于周四加入北约，这意味着西方防务联盟几乎包围了波罗的海--俄罗斯的一条主要石油贸易路线及其一支舰队的所在地。@rmilneNordic @maxseddon
item.description:
Sweden set to join Nato Thursday, meaning the western defence alliance has nearly ringed the Baltic Sea, a major oil trading route for Russia & home to one of its fleets.

A move pushed by Putin's invasion of Ukraine, not by US. @rmilneNordic @maxseddon https://t.co/caLDGWptNQ

— Christopher Miller (@ChristopherJM) March 7, 2024
